comments:
Description:


Build number:
2.2.1.v20070727-0630
Steps:
1. New Project->BIRT Web Project.
2. In project facets, select 5.0 in Java version, click Finish.
3. Select project, right click, select Run As->Run on Server.
4. Click View Example in opened BIRT welcome jsp page.
5. Change the URL to run test1.rptdesign, Parameter window is pop up.
6. Set Cust:1 and Click OK button.
Expected result:
The value can be passed to report.

Actual result:
See screenshot.

Can't reproduce this exception(Use tomcat5.5). But can't display SVG chart now. Check the output HTML, it is wrong that use tag to show a svg chart. Reassign to engine team to check it.

I have just fixed the bug 198059. SVG can be displayed in HTML now.

Please test this bug again.

Thanks.

The exception is due to workspace env. issue. Not BIRT issue.
Clean workspace, it works well.
